ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(Press__c && SocialPlan__c, Press__c && TelecomEmployee__c, Retired__c && SocialPlan__c, Retired__c && TelecomEmployee__c, Retired__c && Minor__c, Retired__c && Strategic__c, SocialPlan__c && TelecomEmployee__c, SocialPlan__c && Minor__c, SocialPlan__c && Strategic__c, TelecomExEmployee__c && TelecomEmployee__c, TelecomExEmployee__c && Minor__c, TelecomExEmployee__c && Strategic__c, TelecomEmployee__c && Minor__c, TelecomEmployee__c && Strategic__c, Strategic__c && Influencer__c)
